## EthersGivetyConnectionOptionalParams interface

Optional parameters of [ReadableEthersGivety.connect()](./lib-ethers.readableethersgivety.connect_1.md) and [EthersGivety.connect()](./lib-ethers.ethersgivety.connect_1.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface EthersGivetyConnectionOptionalParams 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [frontendTag?](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnectionoptionalparams.frontendtag.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Address that will receive GVTY rewards from newly created Stability Deposits by default. |
|  [userAddress?](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnectionoptionalparams.useraddress.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Address whose Trove, Stability Deposit, GVTY Stake and balances will be read by default. |
|  [useStore?](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetyconnectionoptionalparams.usestore.md) | [EthersGivetyStoreOption](./lib-ethers.ethersgivetystoreoption.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> Create a [GivetyStore](./lib-base.givetystore.md) and expose it as the <code>store</code> property. |
